title: I still have 3 refunds, but why can't I refund?
body: Hi, I was just wondering why i cannot refund my talon skin? I still have all 3 refunds but it says they are not refundable.

replies.body:
No,it's because showdown shop is live,so you can't refund.
Happy to help!!!!
Don't worry its the pre season, Nothing matters
maybe you cant refund after you have had it for a while?
